00033 #include "node_shader_util.h"
00034 
00035 /* **************** RGB ******************** */
00036 static bNodeSocketTemplate sh_node_rgb_out[]= {
00037     {   SOCK_RGBA, 0, "Color"},
00038     {   -1, 0, ""   }
00039 };
00040 
00041 static void node_shader_init_rgb(bNodeTree *UNUSED(ntree), bNode *node, bNodeTemplate *UNUSED(ntemp))
00042 {
00043     bNodeSocket *sock= node->outputs.first;
00044     bNodeSocketValueRGBA *dval= (bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value;
00045     /* uses the default value of the output socket, must be initialized here */
00046     dval->value[0] = 0.5f;
00047     dval->value[1] = 0.5f;
00048     dval->value[2] = 0.5f;
00049     dval->value[3] = 1.0f;
00050 }
00051 
00052 static void node_shader_exec_rgb(void *UNUSED(data), bNode *node, bNodeStack **UNUSED(in), bNodeStack **out)
00053 {
00054     bNodeSocket *sock= node->outputs.first;
00055     float *col= ((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value;
00056     
00057     copy_v3_v3(out[0]->vec, col);
00058 }
00059 
00060 static int gpu_shader_rgb(GPUMaterial *mat, bNode *node, GPUNodeStack *in, GPUNodeStack *out)
00061 {
00062     bNodeSocket *sock= node->outputs.first;
00063     float *col= ((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value;
00064     GPUNodeLink *vec = GPU_uniform(col);
00065 
00066     return GPU_stack_link(mat, "set_rgba", in, out, vec);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void register_node_type_sh_rgb(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00070 {
00071     static bNodeType ntype;
00072 
00073     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, SH_NODE_RGB, "RGB", NODE_CLASS_INPUT, NODE_OPTIONS);
00074     node_type_compatibility(&ntype, NODE_OLD_SHADING|NODE_NEW_SHADING);
00075     node_type_socket_templates(&ntype, NULL, sh_node_rgb_out);
00076     node_type_init(&ntype, node_shader_init_rgb);
00077     node_type_size(&ntype, 140, 80, 140);
00078     node_type_exec(&ntype, node_shader_exec_rgb);
00079     node_type_gpu(&ntype, gpu_shader_rgb);
00080 
00081     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00082 }
